home.explanation: Here is some text which explains what this website is doing

login.emailhelp: The email adress you have used to create an account.
login.passwordcredentialerror: Your email address or password is not correct.
login.othererror: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
login.registerlink: Don't have an account yet? Click here to sign up
login.forgotpasswordlink: Forgot your password? Click here to reset

profile.emailplaceholder: Type in your new email address
profile.emailrepeatplaceholder: Please type your new email again
profile.oldpasswordplaceholder: Please type in your current password
profile.newpasswordplaceholder: Please type in your new password
profile.emailmismatcherror: The two email addresses are not the same.
profile.emailusederror: The email address is already taken.
profile.passwordmismatcherror: Your new password and the repeated password are not the same!
profile.passwordnotsecureerror: Password must be at least 10 characters.
profile.othererror: An error occured. Please try again later.
profile.emailchangeinfo: Please note that you will need to use you new email address to sign into your account

register.emailplaceholder: Type in the email address you wish to use
register.emailhelper: We'll never share your email with anyone else.
register.name: Your full name
register.nameplaceholder: Please type your full name here
register.namehelper: We will use your name for display purposes
register.repeatpasswordplaceholder: Type in your new password once again
register.passwordmismatcherror: Your two passwords are not the same,
register.passwordinsecureerror: Password must be at least 10 characters.
register.emailtakenerror: The email you want to ue is already taken
register.othererror: Something went wrong. Try again later.
register.loginlinkbottom: Already have an account? Click here to log in!

messages.passwordchangesuccess: Your password has been changed. Please log back in with your new credentials.
messages.emailchangesuccess: Your email has been changed. Please log back in with your new credentials.
messages.notauthorized: You have to be logged in to view this page.
messages.registrationsuccess: Your account has been created! Please log in with your credentials.
messages.newpredictionsuccess: You successfully submitted a new prediction!

prediction.titleplaceholder: Enter a title for your prediction
prediction.predictiontitlehelp: This will be shown in the public queue.
prediction.dropzonehelper: Click here to open a menu or drag your file into this area
prediction.submitpredictioninfo: You are not able to submit a prediction until your file has finished uploading.
prediction.fileisempty: You need to upload a file in order to start a prediction.
prediction.titleisempty: You can not submit a new prediction without a title.
prediction.othererror: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
prediction.nofileerror: You need to select a file before you are able to upload
prediction.uploadError: There was an error uploading your file. Please try again.
prediction.deleteError: There was a problem deleting your file.

history.explanationcontent: The tabs on the left side of the screen are the names of all the predictions that you have started so far. Click on the nams to get moe information about them!
history.searchbar: Type to filter by prediction title

queue.popupdeleteheader: Confirm that you want to delete
queue.popupdeleteexplanation: If you delete this item from the queue, it won't be executed anymore. Furthermore, it will be removed from your history  and the file connected to it will also be deleted.
queue.authdeletionerror: You are not authorized to delete this prediction.
queue.popupdeleteerror: The deletion of the prediction has been cancelled.
queue.popupdeletesuccess: The prediction has been deleted successfully.
